story:
What is The Hollywood Boulevard Film Festival?

The Hollywood Boulevard Film Festival is an annual independent film festival held in Los Angeles, CA. We strive to support new filmmakers and students from all over the world by promoting their work and their talent. We are a team of experienced professionals who are committed to showcasing high-quality films which are meant to be explored through the eye of an expert. Our objective is to introduce brave and talented independent filmmakers into a realm of exposure, opportunity and distribution.

Your contribution helps us:

  • Support independent filmmakers by reviewing, marketing, and distributing their work, allowing them to overcome any obstacles that may hinder their ability to create.
  • Provide new filmmakers with a supportive, enthusiastic audience to showcase their talents to.
  • Introduce emerging artists and students to film industry professionals who can offer advice and career direction.
  • Deliver guidance and support to our filmmakers throughout every stage of the process – from submission to award presentation.
  • Inspire audiences and creators alike through the art of independent film.

 

Our goals for 2018:

The Hollywood Boulevard Film Festival’s overarching goal is to serve the art of film in a way that celebrates emerging filmmakers. After the success of our first festival last year, we’re committed to helping new filmmakers break into the industry again this year. With your help we can showcase their talent, recognize their work and award them, in turn inspiring them to keep creating and telling amazing stories.


 

How you can help:

Donate and spread the word!

We appreciate every effort, no matter how large or small, to help us achieve our goal.

If you have any suggestions, questions or comments, feel free to contact us by e-mail or through our website.

 

Spread the word!

Support independent filmmakers by sharing our campaign link with all your friends & followers! Use https://igg.me/at/thbff and #thbff.

story:
¿Qué hacemos?

Nuestro principal objetivo es consolidar una plataforma de exhibición que parta de la pluralidad de los saberes y de las expresiones artísticas presentes en un lugar, que como el nuestro, se moviliza entre diversas tendencias, formas de aproximación y modos de acceder al arte actual en todos sus campos, por lo que nos definimos como espacio con la finalidad de abarcar no sólo lo referido a la exposición del arte actual, sino también talleres, conferencias, jornadas, encuentros y otros que hablen sobre la actualidad venezolana sin perder de vista la centralidad de la expresión artística.

​¿Qué necesitamos?

Con el fin de recaudar fondos económicos para llevar acabo nuestras actividades planificadas para el próximo año, puedes contribuir con nosotros a través de dos modalidades:

  • Adquisición de obras 
  • Donaciones

¿Cuánto necesitamos?

Para el desarrollo exitoso de nuestro compromiso de difundir y proyectar el arte joven de la región, nos proponemos una meta de 1.000 $

¿Qué obras están en venta?

Puedes ver nuestro catálogo de obras en venta y conocer más de nuestra propuesta en el siguiente enlace:

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1zhLuDVd-Y3NuqKrwNkmtkaNGyAuWU6aA

story:
Short Summary

ARTrepreneur, is a non-profit collaborative, designed to provide an instructional program for young Artrepeneurs to learn modern production, recording, artistic design, and life leadership skills. DTOM and Erace The Hate have teamed up to target communities in America that are afflicted with high amounts gang-related gun violence and seek to provide an educational alternative to the artistically inclined individuals within these communities. Our core purpose is to provide resources and structure within a professional media production facility.  We will encourage positive channeling of their energy to produce artistic works rather than participate in gang-related activities. We choose to Peace to help stem the tide of gun violence taking the lives of so many innocent children in America’s toughest neighborhoods.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are working to raise the funds necessary for capital investments into the equipment of a state-of-the-art production studio. We're also working to raise the funds necessary to operate the highest quality workspace and obtain exceptional instructors/practitioners to educate these students on channeling their talents to develop life skills.

We ask the public to help support the development of a program that can be scaled into multiple communities.  We will cultivate the creative talents of our youth and help save them from the perils of gun violence that take lives and rip families apart. Help give our children the skills needed to Increase the Peace!
 

Costs

$50,000 -- Building Expense

Our goal is to raise capital to expand our initiative to provide 4 ARTrepreneur programs in 2019. Each program costs $12,500.

$6,250 -- Program Staff, ARTrepreneur Instructors, Special Guests, Videographer

$6,250 -- T-Shirts, Show Production, Program Materials, Books, Supplies, and Food


As a thank you for contributing to our campaign, you'll receive some amazing perks!

Artrepreneur swag (hoodie, cap, t-shirt, etc)

Event ticket - 2019, the ARTrepreneur Program is on the road! In addition to our in-studio sessions we will be taking our initiative on the road to different schools and community centers.  Enjoy a live performance, and a real-time presentation of the students writing and producing a song.  This event is only open to staff, parents, guest speakers, and selected donors.

Solution Provider – This contributor has the right to make suggestions/requests regarding the destination of the the next ARTrepreneur tour stop.

 

The Impact

Our youth are dying. The number one cause of death for black males aged 15-34 is gun violence.

Your donation helps the youth escape senseless gun violence by giving them healthy alternatives.  We use music and arts to expose youth to business and potential career paths. You're helping us shape the future of children who might not have had the opportunity to get out of their current circumstances.

These kids are able to stay off the streets and live a productive, positive life that ends the cycle of violence.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute right now? Doesn't mean you can't get involved! Here are some ways to help.

Share this page on your social media! Let your followers know why this community project is important to you.

Click here to sign up for our email newsletter, and help us spread the word about building up our youth.

Follow us on Facebook and Instagram!

story:
What do we want to do:

We want to make the first in the history of our Adygs (Circassian) people Historical-Geographical Map. Names of about 1,000 inhabited localities and about 1,500 geographical locations (mountains, rivers, lakes, caves, waterfalls) will be put on this map – in the original Adygs (Circassian) language with explanatory material about the origin of these names, also in Russian, English, Arabic, Hindi….

The history should be available to everyone.

 

Why do we want to do it:

Nowadays Adygs people (Circassians) live for generations in more than 15 countries, our total number is about seven and a half million people, which is less than 0.1% of world’s population.

Ban on studying our mother tongue in schools, ban on the demonstration of our culture, constant changes in the name of settlements and geographic locations, as well as natural processes in the form of degradation and assimilation led us to the fact that - we are endangered people.

The general map of our homeland will allow: at least to slow down these harmful processes, and at most to reverse them, strengthen the connection of all Adygs people (Circassians) on the planet.

 

Our product on Indiegogo:

● Each of our Backers will get our most expensive product (which can be purchased for $1) - a place on the map with Your name, with a link to Your account. Also, we will indicate You on our website (www.AdygaHasa.com)  and in the book we want to publish after completing the work.

You can also purchase a certificate (A4 format in a laminated wrapper) with a thank You text to You for Your help in creating the first map in the history of our folk (with the signature of two important people planned to involve in this project).

If You would like to give us even more substantial help, we are glad to offer You to acquire some ancient Circassian traditional musical instruments . All musical instruments are handmade, their sounds are partly represented in this video.

 

How do we plan to do it:

● Work on the map will go on the Google Earth platform, after the completion of the work, the map will be transferred to the Google Maps API (until the end of 2019), subtotals will be published on Yandex Maps.

● Sources of information about the objects will serve - ancient maps, archival records, stories, legends - in the case of geographical objects -  will be resources of information about the objects. Depending on the number of attracted people and investments, we will put to the map 100 localities and 100 geographical locations per month.

● The proceeds are planned to be spent on the services of translators, and thanks to historians who help us with this project.

Meaning: 

The background is important. If we forget our history, we will constantly repeat all the mistakes, wars will occur again, and people will continue to live in violence, in ignorance.
If each of us makes his or her effort to save the memories - the world will become more and more understandable, people will live better and happier than their predecessors.


In our project, we are going to mention not only history, but also those who helped in preserving history. We want to pass it through the generations and we also want people studying themselves on this map to get to know people who have helped in memory retention - You.

P.S. The video was fully voiced by me in English but after watching the footage, even I did not understand what I was saying)   English is not my native language and in order native English speakers understand me -we decided to voice the video using a speech synthesizer.

(YouTube subtitles are available)

story:
SALVIAMO LA DANTE!

The Dante Alighieri Institute in Innsbruck is a not- for-profit organisation. Since its inception nine years ago it has made a huge contribution to the promotion of the Italian language and culture.

In summary here is a small selection of what has been achieved.

Over this nine-year period we have had 3,000 students. We have been so impressed by their motivation and deep desire to learn as much as possible. We miss you all!

There has been a total of 2,800 students who have either taken the PLIDA exams or been involved in the preparation courses. World-wide this is one of the most important Italian Language Certificates.

We have created various events regarding the Italian culture; to be mentioned the Festival del Cinema Italiano, three days of Italian cinema that have been attended by about 3,000 people during the last five years. Our event Italia in Musica has already taken place twice.

We have co-financed 12 projects to support students in Tyrolean schools.

Through the Erasmus+ Traineeship programme there have been 45 trainees attending 25 Italian Universities.

If you want to know more, please visit our website. www.dante-innsbruck

 

Like many places throughout the world, we are working hard to help the organisation keep afloat. By the end of April 2021 there is the outstanding amount of 30,000 euros that is needed to avoid the closure of our much-loved organisation. That is why we are turning to you for any help you can give us.

 

This autumn the Dante Alighieri Institute and its team would love to celebrate our 10th Birthday with all of you.

Help us to save Dante Alighieri Institute! Thank you so much.

 

ISTITUTO DANTE IBK

IBAN AT45 3600 0000 0077 3218

Payment description: SALVIAMO LA DANTE!

Your chosen donation

  1. Dante Gold    €100
  2. Dante Silver   €50
  3. Dante Bronze   €25
  4. Free offer

Your Team Dante

story:
Theatre Ontario’s Youth Advisory Committee connects young people pursuing a career in theatre across the province. In 2017, we have one goal: empower youth as active decision makers in their own careers.

Emergence is designed specifically for youth who might face barriers to access arts training and education. We know that the future of the arts depends on showcasing underheard voices, and increasing representation of diverse stories. We believe that this change starts with youth, and giving youth access to mentorship and training opportunities.

Emergence is a unique event in the city because it is completely youth-organized, with the support of Theatre Ontario. We are hiring young working artists to teach workshops, giving youth a chance to meet new collaborators and see people they can relate to in leadership roles. Community leaders will facilitate decolonized panels that place youth voices front and centre. This day is both an educational and an employment opportunity for many young artists of diverse backgrounds. By offering volunteer positions in exchange for entry, and providing food to keep our participants going throughout the day, we hope to eliminate financial barriers to access.

Your contribution to Emergence will align you with forward thinking young people, and demonstrate support for a more accessible Ontario for future generations. Donations will go towards paying our mentors, providing necessary materials for workshops, and offering food to our participants so they can attend the day at the lowest cost possible.

story:
Queremos llegar a la herida que más le duele a nuestra Colombia: la indiferencia y el abandono que ocasionan violencia y tienen como principal víctima a nuestros niños, niñas y jóvenes. 

Con tu ayuda queremos llegar a regiones de difícil acceso y presencia de actores armados con talleres de circo (malabares y clown) danza y música. Con ello contribuimos a acabar con las causas de la pobreza en Colombia; acercar a la Colombia rural con la Colombia urbana a través de imágenes de belleza y alegría. 

Tu ayuda nos permite llegar a estas zonas con artistas profesionales que comparten su habilidad y enseñanza a los niños, niñas y jóvenes; técnicas y disciplinas con las que ocupan su tiempo libre y brindan una alternativa para enriquecer su proyecto de vida. 

Los fondos de la campaña también se invertirán en la realización de un documental sobre las historias de los niños y sus familias. De cómo este proceso impacta su realidad positivamente, construye cultura y cambia el entorno. 

Hemos llegado a tres zonas de poca (casi nula) presencia del estado y lo hemos hecho con un espectáculo clown generando alegría y diversión, llevando un mensaje de esperanza y cercanía. 700 personas entre niños, niñas, jóvenes y adultos disfrutaron los espectáculos y entre 300 niñ@s recibieron talleres de clown y malabares en una segunda visita.

También producimos nuestro primer corto documental "De qué ríe un payaso cuando ríe" que obtuvo un importante reconocimiento en el festival de cine colombiano de Buenos Aires, Argentina.  

En el mundo mueren diariamente miles de niños por desnutrición pero mueren muchísimos más por falta de oportunidades, por causa de conflictos violentos y delincuencia común. En Colombia, por tener estos mismos problemas unidos al narcotráfico, el impacto negativo es mucho más grande por consiguiente necesita de alternativas de solución audaces, creativas, de mayor presencia y acompañamiento.    

Gracias por tu interés en este proyecto. No dejes de compartir esta campaña, esta es otra forma en la que puedes ayudar: hacer que llegue a todos tus contactos y de forma personalizada a quienes creas que podría ser de gran interés y tengan forma de ayudarla económicamente. 


¡No olvides usar las herramientas de compartir de Indiegogo!
Mil gracias y una bendición gigante por tu generosidad.

Short Summary(brief draft)

Share is about giving and recieving.

there is a point structure where people have likes and comments and even amount of help provided on the profile and offcourse the recieving amount provided in the app.

The points are based on the category of help. and there is category section where people can donate to people who dont have anything to spare..

For example:

John(profile): followers, likes, comments,shared,recieved.

-John goes to share category, checks other profiles for people who need things. checks whats needed and clicks on the profile he wants to share with.

The talks with the person on the other end with a location provided as well.

Tells him "i have a lamp for example that i dont need"

the man for exmp(Peter) accepts his offer and either wants to go with lending option or share option. They agree on terms with button application systems and then they meet. they can share videos and all types of stuff with emojis in the app and cool animations.

story:
Hello, my name is LeMaire Lee. I am a comedian in Philadelphia and I have a dream and that dream is to become the Admin of the Philly Comedy Network(PCN) Facebook Group. I have been working hard in the Philadelphia comedy scene over the last  8yrs to establish myself as a fixture. If you've been to any Philadelphia Open Mic you probably have seen me. If you've been to a mic and I wasn't there I was probably out doing a show representing Philadelphia to the best of my abilities. 

The current Philadelphia Comedy Network Admin for some reason or another refuses to recognize this movement as legitimate or even viable. Some of the current administration has willingly admitted that they don't have time and ignore most things going on in the group. Not me I pay attention. My goal is to have a unified comedy scene and to just let funny, be funny. 

I honestly do have a lot of things I would change about the PCN that would help all of the comedians not only in Philadelphia, but all the comedians who belong to the Group.  #LeMaireCares #RealLeMairican

What We Need

  • The first step to a Unified Comedy Scene is a Billboard.
  • Right over 76 or 95. Right on the Highway

Risks & Challenges

  • I understand if you are weary. 
  • This Joke might have gone to far.
  • but it hasn't.
  • It is only beginning.
  • I have a clear vision for change in the PCN,

story:
Cultural Benefit

The valiant supporters have declared that selling the historic and beloved Flanders Mansion to the highest bidder does not serve the community. Many have fought the city council for a generation in order to stop them from selling this culturally sensitive and community-owned property.

Many City Council members, neighbors, and concerned Carmel citizens have been hoping that a community benefit use for this property will one day come. However, no proposal has yet to meet those financial and community needs. Finally, here before you is a proposal that solves all the issues plaguing this property all these years.

A coalition of local citizens have come to rally behind a brilliant solution. 

A new Flanders coalition has identified an ideal family who has presented a wonderful formula for all stakeholders and have imagined a use which meets the City's specific criteria: a preservation plan that keeps the cameras rolling for the benefit of us all!

  • A historic opportunity to preserve a landmark estate in the center of town.
  • A committed Curator candidate, who has rallied his community behind his bold, no-footprint digital vision.
  • Endless benefits to our residents, local non-profits, and our town's artistic legacy. (see “Perks”)

We're using this platform to seek out additional partners to our coalition. To receive a proposal, please contact us directly at curator@thenewpeninsula.com

The Flanders Mansion Solution

This proposal is a success for Carmel and those who have loved the potential of this landmark estate to inspire positive change. Anyone can dream of ideas for the property, but the only legal use is for a Residential-Single-Family-Dwelling. Curatorship proposals (due Dec. 12th) suggesting other use classifications will be considered non-responsive. Any commercial use is strictly forbidden and the vision presented here follows all of the criteria of the city's request for proposal (RFP) exactly.

  • We are seeking $300,000 for initial restoration costs, not withstanding future needed renovation estimates.
  • 100% of all donations are for this property's restoration. 
  • Your endorsement and contribution will be added to this "Restoration of the Outlands Fund" Curatorship Proposal that is dedicated to restore, preserve, and maintain the Flanders Mansion and grounds.
  • Our proposal requires this minimum funding in order to be considered for the lease. If we do not reach our goal, your contribution will not be used; all donations collected will be returned.

A Motion-Picture-Making Family

Our donors want this historic property restored to provide a cultural benefit to all of us. Through the Buffo Curatorship, we don't just get a revived historic building with one fortunate family residing in it. This family of storytellers pledges to document the entire restoration process and beyond for the benefit of this community's rich artistic and historical legacy.

  • Ongoing video production to support and document the restoration process for the benefit of local commerce, resident groups, and add to Carmel’s deep, artistic history.
  • A Satisfaction Guarantee that our proposal precisely meets all of the criteria of the city's published RFP.
  • A world-class local restoration team with extensive celebrated history of restoring properties similar to this one.
  • A large number of endorsements from the citizens, community foundations, and neighbors.
  • A well-liked family with a track-record of integrating their creative ambitions with the artistic legacy of Carmel-by-the-Sea through video, education, and community service.  
  • A real solution to the Flanders Mansion challenge that brings the best option of a cultural benefit that this property can have for the community within a "Single-Family Home" use.

Risks & Acknowledged Costs

This old building needs a lot of love. It’s going to take a lot of investment of time and money, and even if we're successful at meeting our fundraising goal and securing the lease, total restoration costs could be upwards of another $1.7 million. If we can raise $300,000 in 30 days, we can surely raise the rest within 5 years.

  • Reaching our initial goal will bring attention and confidence to our proposal. Many sources to support the completion of the restoration exist.
  • Our restoration plan will first tackle the critical systems outlined in the City's RFP. Within a year or two, we'll know how much more money we'll need to finish the job as needed.
  • The restoration process will be led by Thomas Batemen Hood, Architect and Restoration Manager with 35+ years in local Build & Design, a Rotarian, Past Board President of the Monterey History and Art Association, Board Member of the Carmel Heritage Society, best of Houzz Award Winner, and is currently restoring a property within a stone's throw of Flanders.

  • John Lewis, a Monterey County native and CEO of Lewis Builders, is a respected expert in building and construction on everything from structural conditions to interior design. He has expertise in Healthy Homes, professional evaluation of indoor air quality, water intrusion/mold, Universal Design, and is a certified Aging-in-Place Specialist.  Lewis Builders' most recent historic renovation project, commonly referred to as “Castle House,”  is a complete home remodel, including water intrusion/mold, on a 1925, 16-room, Tudor Revival Cottage, located at 3345 7th Ave, Carmel.  This 16-month project has an estimated completion date of Feb/March 2019.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are asking you to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. We're looking for our partners. If you know of someone we should talk to, please help in these ways:

  • Accommodate a referral by forwarding the newsletter you may have received with a brief introduction, copy & share the URL of this campaign, or simply send us both an introductory email at curator@thenewpeninsula.com
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Please become a "Tea-Timer!" when you pledge $5. This will add your name to our list of donors and this is a huge help! (Remember, your credit card will not be charged unless we reach our $300,000 goal.)

Join us to take care of this historic property once and for the benefit of us all - thank you for your support!

warmest,

Mike & Brittney Buffo

story:
Short Summary - Descripción

ARS Colombiana is a musical practice and teaching center for adults and seniors. With a strong social sense, we believe in music as an unparalleled means to improve the quality of life of those who have given us so much. That is why at ARS Colombiana we have created, more than a music school, a group of friends in which the most important thing is the welfare of each of our students.

 

ARS Colombiana es un centro de Práctica y Enseñanza musical para adultos y adultos mayores. Con un fuerte sentido social, creemos en la música como un inigualable medio para mejorar la calidad de vida de aquellos que nos han dado tanto. Por eso en ARS Colombiana hemos creado, más que una escuela de música, un grupo de amigos en el que lo más importante es el bienestar de cada uno de nuestros estudiantes.

 

What We Need & What You Get - Lo Que Necesitamos

However, we still have much to fulfill our dream: a site perfectly suited to the limitations and needs of our members, in which we can provide, in addition to the musical activity, spaces for recreation, well-being, health and cultural enrichment. We are on the good way; our musical groups are in constant activity and, eventually, we have presentations and concerts that enhance the activity that our adults perform with so much love. We have great challenges: we need to adapt the spaces of our headquarters with easy access, adequate furniture, coffe space and quality instruments. It is necessary to adapt ourselves to the requirements of the law for the protection and prevention of disasters, to install security measures to protect the assets that we have achieved and, why not? Dreaming of our own headquarters one day. Surely with the help of all we will achieve it.

 

Sin embargo, todavía nos falta mucho para cumplir nuestro sueño: un sitio perfectamente adecuado a las limitaciones y necesidades de nuestros integrantes, en el que podamos brindar, además de la actividad musical, espacios de esparcimiento, bienestar, salud y enriquecimiento cultural.

Vamos por buen camino; nuestras agrupaciones musicales se mantienen en constante actividad y, eventualmente, logramos presentaciones y conciertos que engrandecen la actividad que nuestros adultos realizan con tanto amor.

Tenemos grandes retos: necesitamos adecuar los espacios de nuestra sede con accesos fáciles, muebles adecuados, cafetería e instrumentos de calidad. Es necesarioadaptarnos a los requerimientos de ley para la protección y prevención de desastres, instalar medidas de seguridad para proteger los bienes que hemos conseguido y, por qué no? Soñar con nuestra propia sede algún día. Seguramente con ayuda de todos lo conseguiremos.

The Impact - El Impacto

We want ARS Colombiana to be a great center for improving the quality of life of our adults; with your help we will reach more people and create dignified ways of life through music.

 

Queremos que ARS Colombiana logre ser un gran centro de mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de nuestros adultos; con tu ayuda llegaremos a más gente y crearemos formas de vida dignas a través de la música.

 

Other Ways You Can Help - Otras Maneras De Ayudar

If you can not contribute financially to our cause, spread the word ... ARS Colombiana exists and is the best center for music practice and teaching for adults in Bogotá. It will be of great help to us. Thank you.

 

Si no puedes aportar económicamente a nuestra causa, corre la voz... ARS Colombiana existe y es el mejor centro de práctica y enseñanza musical para adultos en Bogotá. Sólamente esto será de gran ayuda para nosotros. Mil Gracias.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! Kuzuzampu-la! We are Michael Hughes and Emily Little, long time guides for Northwest Rafting Company. We had the opportunity this fall to go to the Kingdom of Bhutan and explore a culturally diverse country high in the Himalayas. We left Bhutan with a commitment to start this page, tell the story of Chencho and Thinley, and raise enough money to bring them to Oregon for the same type of opportunity we had.

 

While in Bhutan, we led two guided tours with American travelers and worked side by side with our counterparts in Bhutan. While there we embraced the culture, explored famous Dzongs, monasteries, and watched as western culture blended with the long standing traditions of Bhutan. Lifelong friendships were created working and boating with our Bhutanese guides. Being a country with a Gross National Happiness, the Bhutanese strive to make those around them happy so they can be happy. Our guides generously showed us this attitude and by shared their culture. We want to return the hospitality. This page is dedicated to the Bhutanese guides and providing a life changing trip for them to travel to the US to be immersed in our culture and explore our rivers.

Chencho and Thinley have been guides and kayakers for 10 years, paddling rivers throughout Bhutan, even making some first descents. They have never left their country. Bhutan is a country where wealth is measured by happiness and western influences are just recently becoming prevalent. The people of Bhutan do not have an excess of money. The goal of this fundraiser is to raise money to bring Chencho and Thinley to Oregon, specifically the Columbia River Gorge and Southern Oregon next spring, to paddle the rivers we know best and expand their knowledge of professional river guiding.

 

After watching the short video, we hope… 1. You will be envious and want to go to Bhutan. 2. You won’t be able to avoid the contagious smiles of Chencho and Thinley and see what badass kayakers they are. 3. Hopefully feel generous and willing to share your wealth by kicking in a few bucks.

 

What We Need

All funds will be used primarily for the Bhutanese guide’s visas, and airfare and transportation from Thimphu, the capital of Bhutan, to Portland, Oregon. The rest will help pay for food, lodging, and fuel to take these boys to as many rivers as possible.

What You Get

There are a handful of excellent perks from a simple handwritten thank you to your own traditional Buddhist Thangka painting

The Impact

Not everyone can afford the time or money to adventure across the world for new experiences. Helping this crew of young professionals will help build and change their view of what it means to be a professional river guide. They will get the opportunity to travel outside of Asia and see what else the world has to offer.

Challenges

This is the biggest project we have taken on, never having tried to raise thousands of dollars, and there is so much that needs to get done. There are visa forms to be filled out and obtain, flights to figure out, and of course planning the adventure route.

With all of this is lots of paperwork and hoops to jump through. But a strong backing from friends, family, and outfitters  can help us raise the funds to share a small slice of the American Whitewater community with our Bhutanese friends.

Other Ways You Can Help

It would be excellent if you could help spread the word about our project on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and any other social media you use. It would also be great if you could share with your friends and family that aren't connected via social media. Any and every little bit helps! Thank you so much!! Kadrinche-la.

With all of this is lots of paperwork and hoops to jump through. But a strong backing from friends, family, and outfitters  can help us raise the funds to share a small slice of the American Whitewater community with our Bhutanese friends.


Other Ways You Can Help
It would be excellent if you could help spread the word about our project on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and any other social media you use. It would also be great if you could share with your friends and family that aren't connected via social media. Any and every little bit helps! Thank you so much!! Kadrinche-la.

story:
Ever been in a Spiegeltent?

If you have, you’ll know why we want to bring it to Cambridge. If you haven’t, it’s an antique, beautiful tent that can hold up to 800 people, and has appeared at Edinburgh, London’s Southbank & Leicester Square and many other established festivals across the world.  But... it’s never been to Cambridge before, and we think it’s high time that it did.  (BTW, before we begin, big thanks to Basement Jaxx for letting us use 'Do Your Thing' as the soundtrack for our video and to all the photographers that took part.  There are some lovely shots in there in particular of Cambridge's gorgeous e-Luminate festival.)

WHY DO THIS?

Well firstly, here's a sung (yes, sung) pitch by the festival founder...

 

Enough said!  But in case you don't like videos, we're doing this because Cambridge has some cracking arts festivals and creative content, but until now there’s been nothing that showcases all the creativity of our city in one week *or* in a gorgeous venue like this. The fit is perfect!

We’re not the only ones that think so. Over the past 6 months we’ve talked to as many of the festivals and artists in our city as possible (sorry if we’ve missed any, but please come & find us if we have!) and asked if they’d like to take part.  And the majority have said yes :)

JUST IMAGINE...

One half-term week with cool stuff for tiny tots, teens, adults and all those in-between / that never want to quite grow up.  A content-colliding, soul-tickling, tantalising week of magical entertainment.  Here’s what the programme might look like….

WHO'S TAKING PART? 

  • Cambridge Jazz Festival
  • Cambridge Comedy Festival
  • Cambridge Film Festival
  • Cambridge Science Festival
  • Festival of Ideas
  • Cambridge Cocktail Weekend
  • Ahbab Festival (that’s an Arabic Music Festival)
  • Cambridge Junction
  • Society of the Golden Slippers from London as a guest curator (a real coup!)

We’re also in discussions with three more festivals, and hoping they’ll come on board very soon. We'll keep you updated! 

Then on top of that we have some of Cambridge’s finest creative curators & brands involved:

  • BrewBoard (brewing our House of Cambridge beer and sponsoring a buskers' stage)
  • Cambridge Wine Merchants (they have a lovely gin coming out)
  • Cambridge Union Society (providing our main satellite space)
  • Green Mind Gigs (curating one of the music nights)
  • Independent Cambridge (bringing a fab fashion show)
  • Neon Moon (Burlesque & cabaret club)
  • Muddle & Mint / La Raza (bringing the cocktail night to the tent)
  • Thirsty (doing a whole heap of stuff including the bar & hopefully an event in the tent)
  • We Are Sound (providing an immersive sound experience for the festival)

There’s also going to be a fringe festival around the city at the same time, because feedback from friends has shouted loud and clear about the need for us to promote and support the fantastic home-grown talent.  More on this in the new year!

AND THERE'S MORE. 

We’re setting up a youth board so that around 10 young people can help shape different aspects of the festival… from choosing content for the main Spiegeltent for one afternoon, through to running a fringe stage – giving these young people brilliant work experience, and helping make sure that it’s not just for the 30s & over ;). 

We’re going to work hard to make sure that all the diverse cultures and communities in Cambridge are reached, included and entertained.  

And there’s a big social heart to the festival too: ten tickets for every event will be given out to local charities and organisations that find it hard to access the arts. All tickets will be e-ticketed so that we don’t burn the planet up.

And we’re going to live stream as much of the entertainment as possible from inside the tent *free* to local libraries on the outskirts of the city and beyond to make sure that more people can access it.

SO WHY ARE WE LOOKING FOR MONEY?

That gorgeous beautiful tent is expensive! And the land we’re putting it on, and the fencing, and the power, and the portacabins, the loos, the security, the lighting, the printing…. you get the picture. 

We knew from the get-go that the first year was going to be a big risk financially, but with your help we can cover all the logistical costs and make it feasible.  (A stark fact… most festivals lose money for their first two years.  EEK!).  Speaking of feasibility though, we had a study put together for us by Eddie Barcan (Eddie managed and programmed 23 consecutive sell-out Cambridge Folk Festivals and knows how this world works) so we have a really good idea of what we need.

We need to raise £75K to make this first year happen. We're going to try to raise £25k through crowd-funding and £50k through corporate sponsorship.  Every donation is vital, no matter how small, and will help get the festival off the ground.

WHO IS BEHIND IT?

A lovely cahoot of creatives & business people, that between them have over 40 years of delivering events in our city.  In alphabetical order: 

  • Eddie Barcan (production manager)
  • Andrea Cockerton (founder of We Are Sound)
  • Ellen Downes (co-founder of Enchanted Cinema)
  • Alex Elbro (Cambridge 105 Radio)
  • Vicky Fenton (My Little Festival)
  • Jenny Nelder (our finance & sponsorship guru)
  • Jenny Seabrook (arts critic & blogger) 
  • Richard Wolfstrome (brand & design)

And our advisors:

  • Jules Klass (Snaptitude Photography) - commercial
  • Paul Smith (CamCreatives) - marketing 
  • Rob Tinkler (Cambridge Junction) - programming
  • Catherine Watling-Breen (Catherine Watling) - artistic direction

A lovely, committed, slightly shattered but gung-ho group  :)

We're also delighted to have both BBC Radio Cambridgeshire and Cambridgeshire Music on board as media partners.

AND IN RETURN?

The important bit.  Every single person that supports our crowd-funding campaign will not only have the chest-bursting pride of helping create something fantastic for the city, but they’ll be named & thanked on our website, and will get a signed postcard from the founding team thanking each and every person, personally. 

But there’s more than that if you’re able to help out a bit more! 

  • Discounts off tickets! 
  • Early bird booking! 
  • A lovely selection of eco-friendly House of Cambridge gifts designed by Richard, our designer, that will wing their way over to you when the festival starts 
  • Some even more delicious perks, literally: BrewBoard will be brewing a House of Cambridge beer for us, and a new gin with a strong Cambridge theme will be another reward, thanks to Cambridge Wine Merchants
  • VIP tickets and VIP booths in the tent for evening events
  • Exclusive invites to the pre-launch party, taking place the night *before* the festival begins, in the Spiegeltent, for a sneak preview of the space in action!  There will be fizz.  There will be entertainment.  And there could be you

And, finally, for those of you able to support us with bigger contributions, founder Andrea will gather together her army of singers and musicians, and either write & record a song, just for you, or bring 60 of them and give you a private, for your family and friends only, gig.  Where else on earth would you get that?

Phew.  Thank you for getting to the bottom of this.

WILL YOU SUPPORT US?

Together we can create an absolutely glorious May week in Cambridge.  This is our first year.  And we hope there will be more.  PLEASE help us hit our target of £25k, and thank you so, so much for your support.

And, just a thought. If you think your employer might be interested in sponsoring House of Cambridge, please do let us know asap by emailing hello@houseofcambridge.com.  We've got a lovely sponsorship pack we'd be very happy to send them.

(p.s. massive thanks to everyone that took part. We did a call out to our friends, family, supporters, partners & fans for people to come and film to show that this is about everyone.. and they said yes with only 4 days notice!)

story:
Short Summary

 

People drive the dawn of a new era.

 

   Yun Ma 

I love working with Stembis.com because of the team. There is so much passion and ambition in everyone; it is truly inspirational and makes you want to do your best every day. 

 

Kara Strang 

After my cousin was diagnosed with cancer at 34, I started researching Cannabis. During that time, I had an epiphany, and it ignited in me a passion to join the cannabis industry.

 

Michael Weatherhead 

I want to help empower entrepreneurs and makers of cannabis accessories who share the belief of changing perceptions surrounding cannabis culture.

 

 

Brettany Shannon

Cannabis has been viewed in a specific way over the last several decades, and I’d like to change that. I believe design improves life by inspiring creativity, discussion and progress. I want to bring those aspects into the cannabis industry to support progression.

 

Winston Green Jr

I got into this space because I'm a true entrepreneur at heart and I believe that many people have been stigmatized or even convicted for consuming Cannabis. It's time for a new approach.

 

Diana Martel

The cannabis industry is evolving, and being apart of something special like Stembis.com is the perfect fit for me because I am constantly learning new and valuable information that excites me, and I love sharing what I learn with the community.

 

Binyamin Shimshoon

Being a health professional, I have been exposed to how inaccessible Cannabis has been for my clients. I believe the stigma around Cannabis is holding countless people back from the type of care they want, and I want to help change that.  

 

Alina Shimshoon

I love innovation and bringing the right people together. The cannabis industry is the best space for both; it allows me to be a part of something special and bigger than myself.

 

 

The Importance of Our Campaign

Stembis.com is an e-commerce startup located in Ottawa, Canada. Similar to many businesses in the cannabis industry, our team anxiously waited for the legalization of recreational Cannabis. We saw a need to incorporate modern design and an interactive user experience in order to help businesses grow and change the way consumers shop… for the better. Instead of creating a marketplace where any product can be listed, our team focuses on quality, to create a trusted source. It’s important to us that the marketplace exemplifies a level of sophistication that matches our makers’ quality and our enthusiasts’ expectations.

The current cannabis landscape is filled with uncomfortable stores and an overwhelming amount of noise from bulk purchasing sites, which makes the quest to find unique and well-designed accessories difficult. We are cutting out all of the second-guessing and endless searchings, with a marketplace that has all of your quality cannabis accessories in one place.

We understand how frustrating operating in this space can be (at times), and the challenges many businesses have encountered, even after legalization. Some businesses have been rejected from e-commerce sites (accessory brands included). Others have been unable to receive funding, or have been turned down by media companies in order to showcase their brand publicly. While others have been fined and banned from social media. This is why we created Stembis.com, for the cannabis community to continually expand and grow, without judgment.

With your donations, our generous makers are gifting their products to you. All of our makers create and distribute modern, designer products. These gifts include high-quality accessories like decorative rolling papers, stylish travelers (Italian leather and vegan), and sophisticated smoke boxes. Help us create a memorable experience driven by art and design to excite your inner cannasseur.

 

The Magnitude of Your Contributions

We want to build a platform where makers and enthusiasts can connect in a meaningful way and evolve the industry together... but there are still barriers to overcome. Stembis.com believes that through design and artistry, we can create an experience that best reflects and represents the truth about the culture, to ultimately reduce stigmas. We can't wait to bring our marketplace to life where you can shop in one location for beautiful, high-quality, modern products.

 

For our enthusiasts we want to create:

  • An easy shopping solution to find all your desired products in one location
  • Access to trusted, hand-crafted, designer products
  • Concierge-style customer service.

 

For our makers we want to create:

  • A place to expand and grow, so you can reach enthusiasts who are looking for your products
  • A hassle-free, turn-key setup, and the ability to start merchandising products immediately
  • A marketplace geared to help our makers gain traction and build further momentum in the space.
 

With your support, the Stembis.com community can usher in a new era of Cannabis to move beyond the past.

 

How Your Donations Help

As a startup our funding is limited, and the cost associated with developing, hosting and managing a marketplace like this are high. We need your help in order to deliver the level of sophistication you deserve. We aim to raise at least $15,000, which will be used to purchase our makers’ gifts to you (including shipping), further development, design and hosting. Initial marketing costs, such as paying for the creation of our crowdfunding video, has priority. A special shoutout to Neil Dowling, a talented filmmaker!

 

Our Unique Perks

All perks will include a handwritten thank you note!

Perk 1. 

One set of this summer and sunshine all rolled into this bright sunflower design. Carry your favourite season with you all year round! Ultra-thin and slow burning. Natural coloring made from edible, tasteless hempseed oil and natural pigments. Natural palm pulp rolling paper. 98mm long cone with 26mm non-smokable filter crutch. Ready to be filled with your favourite flowers (not included) 

Perk 2.

One set of this the newest design! Featuring intricate poppy flowers & a sultry red tip. A perfect accessory for any fall outfit! This single cone comes with a jeweled cone holder (blue, purple or clear). Ultra-thin and slow burning. Natural coloring made from edible, tasteless hempseed oil and natural pigments. Natural palm pulp rolling paper.98mm long cone with 26mm non-smokable filter crutch. Flower not included.

Perk 3.

Get lifted & smoke pretty with this one set of trendy cone featuring a metallic filter & pink cannabis leaf detail. Ultra-thin and slow burning. Natural coloring made from edible, tasteless hempseed oil and natural pigments. Natural palm pulp rolling paper.98mm long cone with 26mm non-smokable filter crutch. Ready to be filled with your favourite flowers (not included).

 

Perk 4.

 

Every pipe is hand-made with a laser-etched logo. This pipe has a unique design (no 2 pipes are the same!). This pipe also Includes a 5-pack of screens to prevent clogging.

 

 

Perk 5. 

This luxurious Pineapple Grinder is designed and manufactured for the modern smoker. Features include; high-grade aluminum rod using CNC technology, powerful neodymium magnet enclosure, precision engineered and diamond cut teeth. This grinder is convertible design for On-the-Go.  With a smooth Anodized finish to resist wear.

 

Perk 6.

This luxurious Lotus Grinder is designed and manufactured for the modern smoker. Features include; high-grade aluminum rod using CNC technology, powerful neodymium magnet enclosure, precision engineered and diamond cut teeth. This grinder is convertible design for On-the-Go.  With a smooth Anodized finish to resist wear.

 

Perk 7.

 

Ceramic pipe with a stunning black glaze and reticulating white detail. Shell shaped and completely handmade. Each pipe is different, giving them personality and uniqueness, making them truly intimate objects. They have an organic shape, a sturdy weight in the hand, and a generous bowl. A classy object to pass around a group of friends. A refined smoking experience. 

 

Perk 8.

Ceramic pipe with a matte finish and Stembis.com purple. Shell shaped and completely handmade. Each pipe is different, giving them personality and uniqueness, making them truly intimate objects. They have an organic shape, a sturdy weight in the hand, and a generous bowl. A classy object to pass around a group of friends. A refined smoking experience. 

 

Perk 9. 

The mini paq is perfect for when you need to carry the critical articles for your smoke session. Ultra-thin internal padding keeps your items protected, and water-resistant lining allows for easy maintenance and scent suppression. Dimensions/Weight of Pop Out Pouch: Length - 2.5"  Width (side to side) -8"   Depth - 2.5"  Weight - 2oz

 

Perk 10.

Materials: vegan pebbled leather exterior, vegan suede interior.  Specifications: Dimensions/Weight of External Vegan Paq (unrolled): Length (top to bottom) - 11" Width (side to side) - 8" Depth - 1/8" Weight - 4oz. Dimensions of Pop Out Pouch: Length - 2.5" Width (side to side) - 8" Depth - 2.5”- Weight - 2oz Total Weight of External Paq + Pop-Out Pouch: 6oz

Perk 11. 

This brown stash box is a luxurious addition to any cannabis consumers 'must have' accessories. Handmade utilizing time-honored traditions and craftsmanship like solid hardwood construction and strong finger joint joinery, these stash boxes will make every session an enjoyable one. Each box comes with 4 strain jars and 8 strain labels. 

 

Perk 12.

This blue stash box is a luxurious addition to any cannabis consumers 'must have' accessories. Handmade utilizing time-honored traditions and craftsmanship like solid hardwood construction and strong finger joint joinery, these stash boxes will make every session an enjoyable one. Each box comes with 4 strain jars and 8 strain labels. 

 

Perk 13.

 

This merlot stash box is a luxurious addition to any cannabis consumers 'must have' accessories. Handmade utilizing time-honored traditions and craftsmanship like solid hardwood construction and strong finger joint joinery, these stash boxes will make every session an enjoyable one. Each box comes with 4 strain jars and 8 strain labels.

 

What Happens to Donations If We Don't Reach Our Goal

“Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.”

Reaching our entire goal would be monumental for us and the community we are trying to grow. We understand, however, we may land among the stars and we'll need to prioritize. In this case, the allocation of funds will go to our talented filmmaker, Neil Dowling, as well as our generous makers who provided gifts to you.

As a startup, reaching our full goal will help us greatly. We will focus on engaging a rockstar resource to improve the UX and UI of our explore portal (this is where makers and enthusiasts can build a long-lasting relationship through engagement -- think of it in terms of bridging the best parts of Pinterest, Snapchat, and Facebook). We will enlist the help of an experienced database engineer to bring all of our siloed databases into a single, serviceable one. With this, we can then truly provide a tailor-made customer experience for our enthusiasts.

 

The Impact

Our team wants to push the cannabis industry to unparalleled new heights where enthusiasts get more, and makers get recognized. We want to deliver a wide selection of designer and hand-crafted accessories that reflect your modern style. We embrace a contemporary perspective, and with the help of our talented makers, we aim to remove stigmas and change perceptions of the cannabis industry.

 

We come from a diverse background of business, product development, marketing, consulting, and customer relations. We have previously worked in e-commerce, tech, health & wellness, and advertising & marketing agencies/companies. Each team member believes in this industry, for a plethora of reasons. We are all enthusiasts who want to create the modern commerce experience for the cannabis industry that is driven by art and design and incorporates innovative technology.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We had trouble finding one place to purchase unique, premium accessories that complement modern taste... so we built one. Stembis.com reflects contemporary style and a progressive view of the cannabis industry... but building a marketplace is a long and risky journey; it takes a lot of time, money, and coffee.


As a startup, we will continue to enhance the marketplace for you (with or without donations). With donations, we can improve the quality we present to you and establish a community that you can trust. And let's be real, with the Cannabis Act, marketing regulations and spreading awareness is tough, so we need to get creative to reach fabulous supporters like you.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate? Spread the word! We'd be grateful if you would share our campaign with your friends and networks on social media. Your support goes a long way in helping us gain traction and visibility. Click on those share buttons to the right and thank you in advance!

Help us create a memorable experience driven by art and design to excite your inner cannasseur.
 
The Magnitude of Your Contributions
We want to build a platform where makers and enthusiasts can connect in a meaningful way and evolve the industry together... but there are still barriers to overcome. Stembis.com believes that through design and artistry, we can create an experience that best reflects and represents the truth about the culture, to ultimately reduce stigmas. We can't wait to bring our marketplace to life where you can shop in one location for beautiful, high-quality, modern products. For our enthusiasts we want to create:

An easy shopping solution to find all your desired products in one location
Access to trusted, hand-crafted, designer products
Concierge-style customer service.

 
For our makers we want to create:

A place to expand and grow, so you can reach enthusiasts who are looking for your products
A hassle-free, turn-key setup, and the ability to start merchandising products immediately
A marketplace geared to help our makers gain traction and build further momentum in the space.
 With your support, the Stembis.com community can usher in a new era of Cannabis to move beyond the past.

 
How Your Donations Help
As a startup our funding is limited, and the cost associated with developing, hosting and managing a marketplace like this are high. We need your help in order to deliver the level of sophistication you deserve. We aim to raise at least $15,000, which will be used to purchase our makers’ gifts to you (including shipping), further development, design and hosting. Initial marketing costs, such as paying for the creation of our crowdfunding video, has priority. A special shoutout to Neil Dowling, a talented filmmaker!

 
Our Unique Perks
All perks will include a handwritten thank you note!
Perk 1. 
One set of this summer and sunshine all rolled into this bright sunflower design. Carry your favourite season with you all year round! Ultra-thin and slow burning. Natural coloring made from edible, tasteless hempseed oil and natural pigments. Natural palm pulp rolling paper. 98mm long cone with 26mm non-smokable filter crutch. Ready to be filled with your favourite flowers (not included) 
Perk 2.

One set of this the newest design! Featuring intricate poppy flowers & a sultry red tip. A perfect accessory for any fall outfit! This single cone comes with a jeweled cone holder (blue, purple or clear). Ultra-thin and slow burning. Natural coloring made from edible, tasteless hempseed oil and natural pigments. Natural palm pulp rolling paper.98mm long cone with 26mm non-smokable filter crutch. Flower not included.
Perk 3.

Get lifted & smoke pretty with this one set of trendy cone featuring a metallic filter & pink cannabis leaf detail. Ultra-thin and slow burning. Natural coloring made from edible, tasteless hempseed oil and natural pigments. Natural palm pulp rolling paper.98mm long cone with 26mm non-smokable filter crutch. Ready to be filled with your favourite flowers (not included).
 
Perk 4.
 

Every pipe is hand-made with a laser-etched logo. This pipe has a unique design (no 2 pipes are the same!). This pipe also Includes a 5-pack of screens to prevent clogging.
 
 
Perk 5. 
This luxurious Pineapple Grinder is designed and manufactured for the modern smoker. Features include; high-grade aluminum rod using CNC technology, powerful neodymium magnet enclosure, precision engineered and diamond cut teeth. This grinder is convertible design for On-the-Go.  With a smooth Anodized finish to resist wear.
 
Perk 6.

This luxurious Lotus Grinder is designed and manufactured for the modern smoker. Features include; high-grade aluminum rod using CNC technology, powerful neodymium magnet enclosure, precision engineered and diamond cut teeth. This grinder is convertible design for On-the-Go.  With a smooth Anodized finish to resist wear.
 
Perk 7.
 
Ceramic pipe with a stunning black glaze and reticulating white detail. Shell shaped and completely handmade. Each pipe is different, giving them personality and uniqueness, making them truly intimate objects. They have an organic shape, a sturdy weight in the hand, and a generous bowl. A classy object to pass around a group of friends. A refined smoking experience. 
 
Perk 8.

Ceramic pipe with a matte finish and Stembis.com purple. Shell shaped and completely handmade. Each pipe is different, giving them personality and uniqueness, making them truly intimate objects. They have an organic shape, a sturdy weight in the hand, and a generous bowl. A classy object to pass around a group of friends. A refined smoking experience. 
 
Perk 9. 

The mini paq is perfect for when you need to carry the critical articles for your smoke session. Ultra-thin internal padding keeps your items protected, and water-resistant lining allows for easy maintenance and scent suppression. Dimensions/Weight of Pop Out Pouch: Length - 2.5"  Width (side to side) -8"   Depth - 2.5"  Weight - 2oz
 
Perk 10.

Materials: vegan pebbled leather exterior, vegan suede interior.  Specifications: Dimensions/Weight of External Vegan Paq (unrolled): Length (top to bottom) - 11" Width (side to side) - 8" Depth - 1/8" Weight - 4oz. Dimensions of Pop Out Pouch: Length - 2.5" Width (side to side) - 8" Depth - 2.5”- Weight - 2oz Total Weight of External Paq + Pop-Out Pouch: 6oz
Perk 11. 
This brown stash box is a luxurious addition to any cannabis consumers 'must have' accessories. Handmade utilizing time-honored traditions and craftsmanship like solid hardwood construction and strong finger joint joinery, these stash boxes will make every session an enjoyable one. Each box comes with 4 strain jars and 8 strain labels. 
 
Perk 12.

This blue stash box is a luxurious addition to any cannabis consumers 'must have' accessories. Handmade utilizing time-honored traditions and craftsmanship like solid hardwood construction and strong finger joint joinery, these stash boxes will make every session an enjoyable one. Each box comes with 4 strain jars and 8 strain labels. 
 
Perk 13.
 


This merlot stash box is a luxurious addition to any cannabis consumers 'must have' accessories. Handmade utilizing time-honored traditions and craftsmanship like solid hardwood construction and strong finger joint joinery, these stash boxes will make every session an enjoyable one. Each box comes with 4 strain jars and 8 strain labels.
 
What Happens to Donations If We Don't Reach Our Goal
“Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.”
Reaching our entire goal would be monumental for us and the community we are trying to grow. We understand, however, we may land among the stars and we'll need to prioritize. In this case, the allocation of funds will go to our talented filmmaker, Neil Dowling, as well as our generous makers who provided gifts to you.
As a startup, reaching our full goal will help us greatly. We will focus on engaging a rockstar resource to improve the UX and UI of our explore portal (this is where makers and enthusiasts can build a long-lasting relationship through engagement -- think of it in terms of bridging the best parts of Pinterest, Snapchat, and Facebook). We will enlist the help of an experienced database engineer to bring all of our siloed databases into a single, serviceable one. With this, we can then truly provide a tailor-made customer experience for our enthusiasts.
 

The Impact
Our team wants to push the cannabis industry to unparalleled new heights where enthusiasts get more, and makers get recognized. We want to deliver a wide selection of designer and hand-crafted accessories that reflect your modern style. We embrace a contemporary perspective, and with the help of our talented makers, we aim to remove stigmas and change perceptions of the cannabis industry. We come from a diverse background of business, product development, marketing, consulting, and customer relations. We have previously worked in e-commerce, tech, health & wellness, and advertising & marketing agencies/companies. Each team member believes in this industry, for a plethora of reasons. We are all enthusiasts who want to create the modern commerce experience for the cannabis industry that is driven by art and design and incorporates innovative technology.
 

 

Risks & Challenges
We had trouble finding one place to purchase unique, premium accessories that complement modern taste... so we built one. Stembis.com reflects contemporary style and a progressive view of the cannabis industry... but building a marketplace is a long and risky journey; it takes a lot of time, money, and coffee.
As a startup, we will continue to enhance the marketplace for you (with or without donations). With donations, we can improve the quality we present to you and establish a community that you can trust. And let's be real, with the Cannabis Act, marketing regulations and spreading awareness is tough, so we need to get creative to reach fabulous supporters like you.
Other Ways You Can HelpCan't donate? Spread the word! We'd be grateful if you would share our campaign with your friends and networks on social media. Your support goes a long way in helping us gain traction and visibility. Click on those share buttons to the right and thank you in advance!

story:
It’s time to be under a delusion,                  
                                 and it’s time to turn to truth.

 

Celestial truth  endures no contradictions and delusions. In the same way as true light does not have any darkness within itself.

 

So taking  into consideration this absolutely right statement it was said: «and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded, God shall reveal even this unto you.» (Phi. 3,15). – As it always happens in the same way, when Lord does not send a thousand of people to open it to one person, but sends one person to convince thousands of the truth.

That is why, following the high calling, I do not have any moral right or a desire in my heart to resist such a glorious spiritual mission of exaltation of the celestial truth over people’s delusion.

____________________________________________________

The picture ‘Adam and Eve in Paradise’ – ‘Glorification of God’ presented here is a visual spiritual expression of glory greatness of a PERSON and their total superiority over all other God’s creations in the world. Because Lord created a person in His image and likeness.

As it was acceptable before God that no one else but exactly Adam by his great fame and all his incomparable perfectness similar to God’s could bless the whole world!!! - It is because nobody has ever had fame higher than Adam had.

And consequently now in the same way and the same image a special mission of the picture ‘Adam and Eve in Paradise’ – ‘Glorification of God’ is that it is meant to be a spiritual symbol, blessing all the mankind by its image and inner content!!!

Due to it  the image and  inner content of the picture ‘Adam and Eve in Paradise’ was highly praised by Her majesty Queen of Britain Elizabeth II.

Personal contribution of Queen Elizabeth II in it is established by a legal foundation of what was said: «It is the glory of God to conceal a thing: but the honour of kings is to search out a matter» (Prov. 25,2).

Besides in the handle of Her Majesty the Queen of Britain Elizabeth is written: «Her Majesty Elizabeth the Second, by the Grace of God, the Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain, Defender of the Faith…».

____________________________________________________

So it is really a case of fame and honour not just for kings, but also for all people interested in it to take the most active hand in defending of God’s truth against current delusions in Christian dogmatic theology in issues about faith.

And we have to consider as an example of blatant disgraceful disagreement with the celestial truth the current theological belief about the devil and satan as a former Angel of light.

As since olden times until now absolutely no one knows that such belief totally contradicts what is said about the devil and satan in the Bible and how it is said.

Because based exactly on this delusion some sculptures which depict satan as a fallen angel were created, for example in Madrid (Spain).

Which essentially is a completely false evidence that the old serpent which is devil and satan himself once was a real Angel of light.

____________________________________________________

And that is why, being aware of this delusion where it is acceptable to deride the truth by illegal rising the devil and satan to the level of the holy subcelestial Angels of God, I believe that  my duty is to do everything to precipitate this lie in this world for evermore.

In such a case, I always and everywhere in my evidence and statements about the true gist of the real sanctified will be ruled only by righteous thought way of the holy Apostles of Christ, but not by mistaken notions of any former or current pharisees and scribes.

Therefore, bearing in mind canon law (§ 212:3) which states that the faithful "have the right and even at times the duty to manifest to the sacred pastors their opinion on matters which pertain to the good of the Church" I decided to exercise this right, because personally for me it is my essential duty.

 And that is why I told the gist of this incredibly important subject in common letters which were sent by post to: His Holiness Kirill Patriarch of Moscow and all Russia, a representative of Pope in Moscow, His Holiness Pope Francis, as well as all eleven   Eminentissimus Cardinals of Vatican individually.

Currently response letters were received from Vatican from two  Eminentissimus Cardinals where they homologated  the picture ‘Adam and Eve in Heaven’ and also gave  their blessings to a successful accomplishment of the spiritual mission which was indicated by me.  

Therefore, we should say about these holy priests, that they, similar to those Israeli men, who were kept by Lord, did not bend the knee to the deceitful devil as to an former Angel of light.

____________________________________________________

So if todays Christian world turns out to be incapable to agree to understand and admit the greatness of primordial fame of Adam, as it is depicted in my picture ‘Adam and Eve in Heaven’ – ‘Glorification of God’, it will not be surprising.

Because what ourselves, it at us and idea of Adam.

As the first in the world who turned against our glorious and perfect  ancestor Adam was a villainous, crafty and the most cunning old beast.

It was no one else but the «serpent» (Gen. 3,1), which ruined incomparable fame of Adam out of envy and then by his artifice and crafty seduction made sons of men and all this world believe that he used to be the highest and the most perfect   Angel of light.

It completely turns upside down  the truth and impresses distorted notion about real Angels of light to people’s minds.

 

 

And that is why now it is a high time for make this lawlessness  «known» (Lk. 8,17) for everybody.

So now we have to stand against the devil’s temptation with assuredness and stop to sin against the light of truth by rejecting these delusions.

 

 

 

Because exactly by this rejection we have to  show persuasively to the whole world and to ourselves that we are legal children of God, but not children of the devil and satan who are ready to continue executing ‘cravings’ (Jn. 8, 44) of their father by illegal honouring of him as a former Angel of light.

And, because of it, in the same  way as the old serpent was ‘cast down’(Rev. 12,9) from the heaven by the Angels for his illegitimate claims to the holy highs, we have to cast down definitely heretic religious doctrine about devil and satan, as an ex Angel of light.

 

And certainly in the spiritual idea this victory will be much better, more important and valuable  for us and for the whole world  in spiritual meaning than a physical extermination of similar people, created by the image and likeness of God.

 

 

 

 

____________________________________________________

By this reasoningI appeal to all not indifferent and interested in the establishment of the truth people to ask them to support my plans informationally as well as to render financial assistancefor total and successful solving of tasks which are connected with it.

Such planned events are ranked among the tasks:

  1. To organize holding of exhibitions of the picture ‘Adam and Eve in Paradise’ – ‘Glorification of God’ in different cities and countries.
  2. To order a production and disposing wide-format banners of the picture ‘Adam and Eve in Paradise’ in visually attractive places for promotional purposes.
  3. To publish the author’s books about the issue which was denoted in foreign languages.
  4. To film a documentary which would popularize the spiritual victory of the light against the evil - the truth of God against people’s barbarism and delusion.
  5. To compel making a detailed  research and public discussion of these issues at Councils of Christian Churches with the final aim to change completely a commonly believed delusion into a truly right notion.
  6. To eliminate a wrong dogma from textbooks of dogmatic theology, biblical encyclopedias as well as from other informational resources.
  7. To give explanatory lectures, seminars and meetings with professional audience.
  8. To organize meetings with the highest Hierarches of Christian churches.
  9. Also to reach out to the high and mighties  - leaders, presidents, kings and princes of those countries where they profess the Christian religion for their cooperation.
  10. To gain mainstream media for wide publicity.

 

And also a lot of other similar events have to be done.

Therefore I ask everybody, who has got acquainted with the informational gist of my appeal, to inform their families, friends and acquaintances about it to reach maximum amount of potential SPONSORS.

Because in this world targeted audience which is spiritually close to me consists of ≈ 2,5 billion of Christians,for whom this subject has to be interesting and clear.

Appeal of the Holy Pope Francis to Christians. Vatican.

 

Christians near the Cathedral of Christ the Savior. Moscow.

 

Christians are near the statue of Christ the Redeemer. Rio de Janeiro.

 

Notre Dame Cathedral. Paris.

 

Head of the Anglican Christian Church Elizabeth II at the Divine Liturgy. London.

 

So, even if only a hundredth part sides with me and come forward with my appeal and everybody supports and gives at least one dollar in the name of victory of light over the evil, as a result it will be acomplete guarantee that all the assigned tasks , connected with this great spiritual idea, will be necessarily solved.

As a first step I have to raise $ 250.000. And that is why I reckon on a serious help of as many SPONSORS as it can be.

In order that I could go ahead with continuing my mission for a successful achievement of the goal which was set to the greatest possible extent.

Because in the spiritual dimension this truly great and glorious matter should become a Super-Project of the third Millennium.

The exhibition of the painting "Adam and Eve in Paradise" - "Glorification of God ". The Krasnoyarsk region. Russia.

 

The picture "Adam and Eve in Paradise" at the exhibition "History of the Russian State". Moscow.

 

Consequently, let’s all together, in other words by the whole world, at this precise point in time do everything to beat the evil one without postponing this truly important affair neither for a day nor for a thousand years!!!

So that as a result everybody, having a great psychic income, could legitimately and wholeheartedly tellabout themselves: ‘I’ve helped - and we’ve done it!!!’.

This is all in behalf of the fact that we absolutely cannot let it be in such a disgusting for the truth way, the doctrine about the devil and satan, that he used to be the highest and the most perfect Angel of light from the beginning, which has been accepted in the world Christian dogmatic theology from old times.

Because such dogma absolutely is not a redemptive goodness for the Holy mother - ecumenical Church!!!

And therefore, unless we do it ourselves, nobody will do it instead of us!!!

However, when we raise the truth of God worthily, God will raise us in the same way, as it is truly acceptable before Him!!!

As it is really acceptable before God that we refuse our previous delusions in time as well as turn to the holy verity and the truth of God in time!!!

Because everything should be done at the time, and on time!!!
