story:
Who we are? 

The Acta Croatica project is a link between many historical records about people and their lives. This project is for anyone interested in exploring their family history. Through the systematic digitization and processing of various Croatian population records, we intend to create a large digital depository where you can find information about the often forgotten people who have spent their lives living in the monumental story of Croatian history.

 

 

In addition to this, the Acta Croatica project and platform strives to enable long-term storage of different materials (such as images and texts) to help leave permanent traces of the vast history of these often forgotten people.

 

 

Our vision

After centuries of aspirations for the independence of the Croatian people and state, Croatian political independence was finally achieved, but the Croatian people were overwhelmed by the threat of oblivion. In the era of consumerism and the globalization of communication, politics, and values, the issue of preserving identity and communion is one of the most important tasks of our generation.

 

 

Our vision is to become the leading online platform that will help gather the great historical stories of lesser-known people and preserve their precious family history. Our intention is to create an accessible infrastructure that will open up numerous possibilities when researching our ancestors, their lives, and their forgotten narratives.

 

You can look up information about your name and surname on our site.

 

The impact

Names and surnames are the most precious testimonies of Croatian history. They go beyond spatial, political, and legal categories and firmly weave the connections of the Croatian people to their persistence. Our names and surnames represent the bridging of time and distance by bringing awareness of the past and creating the bonds of communion between people and their family.

 

 

The distinctive name of each person is a mark that follows them throughout their life. It points to the uniqueness of human existence, and it is a permanent monument to all individuals, regardless of their social status. The name itself conceals many meanings. Names are a reflection of life's reality, and they present the knowledge and beliefs of their time. Personal names represent the real treasury of wealth of a nation's language and are the most valuable monument of the traditions and identity of a nation.

 

 

The veneration of both the genus and our ancestors are an inevitable connection to the emergence of an organized way of life. With the development of social relations, there was a rise of family names that we now call surnames. Since then, we can now follow the frequent usage of last names which nowadays carry all the cultural, linguistic, and traditional treasures of a particular nation.

 

How you can help:

We need your help to reach our fundraising goal!

Make a donation and receive perks. 

 

Other ways you can help:

  • Share this campaign with your friends

  • Visit our page for more info

  • Like us on Facebook

  • Follow us on Twitter

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The short version

Help to fund the creation of 200 "Indy Kits" to be distributed to Yes groups all over Scotland. The Kits will contain pro-independence flags, stickers, and thousands of leaflets for grassroots distribution to help convince voters that Scotland will be better off by taking our destiny into our own hands.

 

The slightly longer version

The purpose of this project is two-fold;

  1. To provide Yes groups with merchandise (flags and stickers) which they can sell on to raise funds for their own activities, and;
  2. To provide Yes groups with campaigning materials on the ground in order to increase support for independence above the 50% mark.

Why you should support it?

First of all, you get a nice perk - a Yes flag with a brand new design (see above). But beyond that, you are helping the Yes groups to raise even more funds so that they are ready for #indyref2. To that end, the Scottish Independence Foundation have agreed to support the project and are match-funding the first £8,000! This is an enormous boost and will enable us to provide Yes groups with a lot more materials than a single crowdfunder could provide alone.

While the exact contents of the kit will depend on (to the penny) how much money we raise, this is the provisional contents list for each Kit that we are currently working towards:

  • 35 x Yes flags with a new design
  • 50 x Car window Stickers with a new Yes design
  • 500 x Yes stickers on A4 sheets
  • 1,000 x A5 leaflets on pensions
  • 1,000 x A5 leaflets on currency
  • 1,000 x A5 leaflets on the economy
  • 1,000 x A5 leaflets on inequality in the UK

The leaflets are suggested topics at the moment. We will take these to the National Yes Registry's Gathering in October and work with the Yes groups represented there to democratically decide as a  grassroots movement which messages are most important to get across to voters on the the ground.

We'll also be seeking 3rd-party content from other pro-indy organisations to add to the Kit's contents.

 

This sounds familiar...

It should - we've done it before. The original Indy Kit was developed in 2016 and we delivered 150 of them to Yes groups. It was wildly successful and to this day we still get Yes groups asking when we're going to do another one! It was this proven track record which convinced the Scottish Independence Foundation to back us. So you see, we know that this works, and we know that we can deliver.

 

The target

The target is £12,500. Along with SIF's £8,000 contribution, this will enable us to buy:

  • 8,000 New Yes flags
  • 10,000 Car window stickers
  • 100,000 Weatherproof 50mm Yes stickers
  • 800,000 Pro-independence leaflets

...split across 200 individually packed Kits. If we exceed the target and are very careful with the budget, we might even be able to stretch that to one million leaflets. Imagine what the Yes movement could do with one million carefully targeted leaflets on the streets of Scotland!

Even better - if the Yes groups are able to sell all of the Kit's contents at the prices which we suggest, it will raise £775 for them to use on their own projects. That's £775 per Kit, and we're going to produce 200 of them. That means, for your £12,500 in donations, we could potentially return £155,000 to Yes groups across Scotland. That's one heck of a return on investment!

If 500 people donate £25 each, we would make target and we can set the ball rolling on indyref2. That seems eminently acheiveable.

 

When do we deliver?

The flags are made in China (like almost everything these days), and they will take about 10 weeks to arrive via container ship. so we will be sending out all of the donation perks in the middle of October with the final completed Kits available to all Yes groups at the end of October.

Distribution will be via the National Yes Registry's IndyApp, and Yes groups will be asked to pay a small fee per kit (probably around £30 apiece) to cover the costs of packaging materials and courier delivery (each kit will likely weight in excess of 25Kg).

story:
Seattle needs City Arts.

City Arts needs YOU.

Our city is changing fast, creating many challenges for the local creative community. Yet, even as the media landscape faces challenges of its own and local arts coverage is waning, City Arts is gearing up to grow by remaking the model for arts media. In the months ahead, we’ll be leaving the nest of our parent company and rolling out all sorts of new content and experiences. But we can’t do it without your help!

What’s coming with the NEW City Arts?

  • All of the features, interviews, photos, columns and reviews you know and love, still free to the public both in print and online.
  • An expanded digital platform, with more stories and voices covering the local scene, plus video, podcasts, an interactive calendar and more.
  • A suite of new parties and events, large and small, focused on a variety of creative disciplines, in addition to our existing events.
  • Additional partnerships with businesses to help grow the base of support for local artists.
  • Corporate membership program that to creates stronger connections between businesses and the arts.

Become a Founding Member

In order to manifest our independence, we need you, our community, to support us by becoming Founding Members of the NEW City Arts. You’ll not only be supporting us during a critical time of transition, you’ll also be seeding the ongoing, regular membership program that we plan to launch in the fall. 

What Members Get

  • Home delivery of the monthly print magazine
  • Exclusive access to additional special digital content beyond the magazine
  • Special invitations to arts and entertainment events throughout the region

As a Founding Member, you also get exclusive perks that are part of this one-time-only campaign: custom swag, VIP experiences and ongoing recognition, in print and online.

Below are the custom swag items featuring work by local artists Ryan Molenkamp (water bottle), Izzie Klingels (large canvas tote) and Jazz Brown (mug).

Business Memberships

Founding memberships are for businesses, too. A City Arts membership makes a great benefit to employees, and your support for City Arts shows a commitment to Seattle and the growth and development of local culture.  Join us as a business supporter to receive memberships for your employees along with special advertising opportunities* in City Arts.

*Business supporters receive 12 months of membership for up to 5 employees, along with stickers and lapel pins for each of the members plus one (1) one-third-page print ad in the magazine (or the equivalent in other advertising).

TEAM

ANDY FIFE
CEO and publisher

LEAH BALTUS
Editor in chief since 2011

JONATHAN ZWICKEL
Senior editor since 2011

GEMMA WILSON
Senior editor since 2013

DAN PAULUS
Art director since 2011

AMANDA MANITACH
Visual arts editor since 2012

BARRY JOHNSON
Digital engagement specialist since 2016

The team will also be growing in the months ahead as we look to add a chief technology officer, a chief communications officer, a membership liaison and several new editorial roles.

A City Arts membership makes a great benefit to employees, and your support for City Arts shows a commitment to Seattle and the growth and development of local culture.  Join us as a business supporter to receive memberships for your employees along with special advertising opportunities* in City Arts.*Business supporters receive 12 months of membership for up to 5 employees, along with stickers and lapel pins for each of the members plus one (1) one-third-page print ad in the magazine (or the equivalent in other advertising).TEAMANDY FIFECEO and publisherLEAH BALTUSEditor in chief since 2011JONATHAN ZWICKELSenior editor since 2011GEMMA WILSONSenior editor since 2013DAN PAULUSArt director since 2011AMANDA MANITACHVisual arts editor since 2012BARRY JOHNSONDigital engagement specialist since 2016The team will also be growing in the months ahead as we look to add a chief technology officer, a chief communications officer, a membership liaison and several new editorial roles.

story:
Meow Wolf creates immersive, interactive experiences to transport audiences of all ages into fantastic realms of story and exploration. The group's first permanent installation, launched in March 2016 with support from Game Of Thrones creator George R.R. Martin, showcases the THEA Award-winning House of Eternal Return, where guests discover a multidimensional mystery house with secret passages, portals to magical worlds, climbing apparatus, and surreal, maximalist & mesmerizing art exhibits along with a children's learning center, top ten in the U.S. music venue and cafe area.

The company is composed of nearly 200 artists across all disciplines including architecture, sculpture, painting, photography and video production, virtual and augmented reality, music and audio engineering, narrative writing, costuming and performance, and more. Meow Wolf champions otherness, weirdness, challenging norms, radical inclusion, and the power of creativity to change the world.

We are different type of company. We are legally registered as a public benefit corporation and certified as a Benefit Corporation or B Corp. We value more than just making money; to us that means bolstering our creative team, giving back to our community, and doing our part for the environment.

We are particularly excited to support innovative, community focused artistic and social projects. Meow Wolf comes out of a dumpster-diving, DIY warehouse past, and we want to help emerging artists and arts communities around the world.

About Meow Wolf's DIY Fund

In 2016, in the wake of the tragic fire at Oakland’s DIY arts and music space Ghost Ship, Meow Wolf established an annual fund to assist and help ensure the safety and sustainability of similar venues around the world.

Meow Wolf has been a DIY arts and music community since 2008. We know how difficult it is to operate an alternative venue that builds authentic creative community. We know the pressures to homogenize and be absorbed into disconnected, cookie-cutter ways of living and existing.

Meow Wolf stands in solidarity with DIY communities and recognize they are a critical component to a healthy society—our DIY Fund will continue to support art communities for years to come.

2017 Recap

In 2017, Meow Wolf’s annual DIY Fund made its first payout of $215,000 to DIY community art and music spaces across the country. Selected from among hundreds of applicants, Meow Wolf helped 106 small-scale arts organizations in 21 different states with rent, infrastructure, safety improvements, materials, and equipment.

Looking to 2018 (and beyond)

Meow Wolf has increased our projected DIY Fund for 2018. We’re excited to announce our goal this year is to give $250,000 to DIY arts and music spaces across the United States, but we need your help to get there. This year’s DIY Fund application will launch August 21, 2018, with recipients selected and funding presented by the end of the year.

Criteria for selection include; established, community impact, cross-dimensional spaces, and not funded by large outside organizations. For those who meet this criteria, funding amounts will be awarded based on project need and the total amount raised for the DIY Fund.

We hope you'll join us to support art and creativity in your community!

story:
THE PROJECT

The goal of this non-profit project is to show the European audience what makes Japanese professional wrestling unique in its genre live, thanks to the unprecedented participation of the largest number of Japanese wrestlers ever seen in Europe so far. In addition, it aims to highlight Japanese women’s wrestling, world leader when it comes to train formidable athletes.

The show has been confirmed for Saturday 9th November 2019 at Shopping Center “Città Fiera” of Torreano di Martignacco (province of Udine), in the north-east of Italy. The show will be free entrance and will take place within “Città Fiera Comic Convention”, an important event dedicated to comics, videogames, cosplay and other elements of Japanese pop culture.

The wrestling show will be made in collaboration with "Bologna Wrestling Team", one of the leading wrestling groups in Italy.

Event: Rising Slam

Date: November 9th, 2019 (Sat.)

Venue: Centro Commerciale "Città Fiera", Via Antonio Bardelli 4, Torreano di Martignacco (UD), 33035 Italy. (Shopping center is around 10 minutes by car from Udine, the biggest city in the area, or 20 minutes by bus -Line N°9-, that stops right in front of the building)

Show start: around 16:00

(image taken from 2016's wrestling show in the same structure, featuring 2 Japanese guests)

We believe it is very important that the unique style of Japanese wrestling gets more chances of being seen live also in Europe not only through individual athletes, but rather through a larger group.

Thanks to Your support this dream may become reality, building an event made by wrestling fans for wrestling fans. Furthermore, with the positive outcome of this event, we will be able to open the way for a greater interaction between Japan and Europe also in the extraordinary and unique world of professional wrestling.

 

WHAT WE NEED

Being free for the audience, the event needs funds in order to pay the expenses  for athletes who will perform there. Among these expenses are included things such as gallery, accommodation, transports and meals. Campaign’s goal is to gather €8.000 in order to cover the remaining expenses and thus allow the success of the show both for the audience and for the athletes, who are really looking forward to the chance of testing themselves in front of foreign fans.

Among the names invited to participate in this unique event there are 8 female athletes from Japan:

- Makoto (freelancer), nicknamed “Oriental Doll”, is the athlete with the most experience in the group thanks to Her 13 years of activity.

- Tsukushi from Ice Ribbon, little but fearsome athlete who hides evil tricks behind Her apparent innocence.

- Tequila Saya from Ice Ribbon, with Her first (and last) expedition abroad, will retire on December 31th. Don't miss the chance to see this wonderful lady wrestling in Europe!

- Rina Yamashita (freelancer), surely the most powerful among the wrestlers involved, during matches She’s like a human wrecking ball.

- Tae Honma (AWG Beginning), a bright person and fearless fighter, She uses strategy and technique to get the better of opponents.

- SAKI (AWG Color's), a true leader with great charisma, during matches Her fighting style is very "wild".

- Mari (AWG Color's), a real ninja with unlimited resources, She combines technique, athleticism and lethal kicks.

- Misa Matsui (AWG Color's), exuberant and talented girl, at only 19 years old She’s the youngest of the group.

WHAT YOU WILL GET

If You have the chance to attend the show live, but even if it will be impossible, Your support will be rewarded! Thanks to the kind help of the athletes involved in the event, we thought about many perks to offer to our supporters.

- Postcards: designed with a unique manga style, postcards will be in 8 different versions representing every wrestler called for this show.

- Signed Portraits: portraits 21x29,7cm (A4) in limited edition available only for this campaign and representing the athletes involved in the show.

- T-Shirt: celebrating the largest “Joshi” expedition ever realized in Italy, this T-Shirt is designed by Mari.

- Art Work: special poster designed by Nagatoshi Sakai, official illustrator of New Japan Pro Wrestling.

- Signed Poster: poster of the event with all participants’ signs on it.

- DVD: video of the show.

- Photobook: photo album of the event with comments from guests about their experience in Italy.

- Dinner: exclusive dinner with wrestlers on the event’s day (limited to people who will be in attendance).

 

WHAT IF WE DO NOT REACH THE GOAL?

The show will happen even if our goal won’t be reached, however there is  the risk of having to cut part of the guests due to the lack of budget.

 

WHAT THIS SHOW MEANS

Wrestling is part of the Japanese culture nowadays, gathering people of any type and age inside arenas or even outdoor to witness a unique spectacle. Anyone who has been to a wrestling show in Japan can understand how special and meaningful it is and, despite it is impossible to perfectly simulate that atmosphere, one of the aims of this event is to recreate at least partially the effect of a Japanese wrestling show.

 

IS IT IMPOSSIBLE TO SUPPORT US?

Sure, it is not always possible to offer a contribution. But please take in account the idea of sharing this campaign with Your friends or on Your SNS profiles. Every share counts, thank You for Your help!

 

プロジェクト

このプロジェクトは、ヨーロッパで前例のない数多くの日本人プロレスラー参加によって、日本のプロレスがそのジャンルの独自性と存在感をヨーロッパの皆さまにお見せすることを目的としています。さらに、強力なアスリートトレーニングにおいて世界のリーダーでもある日本の女子レスリングに焦点を当てています。

このイベントは、2019年11月9日土曜日に、イタリア北東部のトレアーノディマルティニャッコ（ウディネ県）のショッピングセンター「チッタフィエラ」で開催されます。入場無料で、日本のポップカルチャーイベント（漫画、ビデオゲーム、コスプレなど）「チッタフィエラコミックコンベンション」内で開催されます。

このプロレスの大会は，イタリアの代表的なプロレス団体「ボローニャ・レスリング・チーム」とのコラボにより行われます。

大会名：”Rising Slam”
開催日：2019年11月9日 土曜日
会場： ショッピングセンター「チッタ・フィエラ」（イタリア共和国フリウリ＝ヴェネツィア・ジュリア自治州ウーディネ県トレアーノ・ディ・マルティニャッコ市ヴィア アントニオ バルデッリ4番地）（ウーディネ県の県都ウーディネから車で10分くらい，またはウーディネから路線番号No.9のバスで20分くらいで建物の正面に着く。）。
開始時間：16時ころ


（写真は2016年に同じ会場で2人の日本人選手をフィーチュアした際のもの）

日本人プロレス界のその独自のスタイルは、ヨーロッパでもより多くの方々に観ていただき、その周知を広めていくべき価値のあるものです。

皆様のサポートのおかげで、プロレスファンによってのレスリングイベント開催という目標を現実化することができ、さらに、このイベントの成功によって日本とヨーロッパのプロレス界のさらなる発展への道を開くことができると信じています。

私たちに必要なもの

入場無料で開催されるこのイベントには、参加するアスリートに費用を支払うための資金が必要です。これらの費用には、ギャラリー、宿泊、交通費、食事などが含まれます。目標額は€8.000です。より多くの方々に日本レスリングを知っていただくため、このイベントを成功に導くためにも、皆様からの心温かいご支援をいただければと思います。

このイベントに招待されたプロレス選手の中に8人の日本女性アスリートがいます。

‐ 真琴（フリーランス）
-  つくし（アイスリボン）
- テキーラ沙弥（アイスリボン）
- 山下りな（フリーランス）
- 本間多恵（AWGビギニング）
- SAKI（AWGカラーズ）
- 茉莉（AWGカラーズ）
- 松井珠紗（AWGカラーズ）

感謝の気持ちを込めて皆様へお返しするもの

実際に会場に足を運んでいただけなくてもご支援いただいた皆様には大会に出場する選手た
ちより，たくさんの特典をご用意しています。
- ポストカード: マンガスタイルで8種類のデザインを用意しました。本イベントに参加する選手が描かれています。‐￥1,197／1枚 - ￥7,179（8枚組）
- サイン入りポートレート: 限定版のポートレート21x29,7cm（A4）は、本イベントの限定品で、本イベントに参加する選手のものです。￥2,393（1枚）- ￥15,555（8枚組）
- Tシャツ: 今までの最も多数の「ジョシ」達のイタリア遠征を記念して，茉莉選手がデザインしたもの。￥3,590
- イラスト作品: 新日本プロレスのオフィシャルデザイナー坂井永年氏デザインによるスペシャルポスター。￥3.350
- サイン入りポスター: 本イベントに参加する選手がサインしたイベントのポスター。 ￥2,991
- DVD: 本イベントのDVD。￥4,547
- フォトブック: 本イベントに参加する選手からのコメント付きのイベントのフォトアルバム。￥5.983（通常版）- ￥10,769（スペシャル版）
- 夕食会: イベント当日、本イベントに参加する選手との特別なディナー（本イベント当日参加出席できる方限定）。 ￥29,913
- スペシャルキット: Tシャツ，フォトブック，DVD，ポストカードとポートレートが１つのパッケージに。このバンドルを選択する人は，メインサポーターとしてDVDにクレジットされます。￥35,895

目標額に到達しない場合

目標額に達しない場合でも大会は開催されますが，予算不足により一部の選手が出場できな
い場合があります。

この大会を開催する意義

プロレスは現代の日本の文化の一部であり，老若男女問わず多くの観客がアリーナや屋外の会場にこの「唯一無二のショー」を観戦しに集まります。日本でプロレスの大会に行ったことのある人なら誰でも，それが如何に特別で意味のあることであるかは分かります。たとえその独自の雰囲気をイタリアで完全に再現することは難しくても，少しでも日本のプロレスの持つ魅力を再構成し伝えることがイベントの目的のひとつでもあります。

他にもサポートできる方法があります！

このキャンペーンを友だちと共有したり、SNSプロフィールで共有したりしてください！。
すべてのシェアが大切で、本イベントの開催の大きな助けとなります！
皆様の心温かい助けに感謝いたします！

 

 

IL PROGETTO

L’obbiettivo di questo progetto non-profit è mostrare al pubblico Europeo cosa rende unico nel suo genere il wrestling professionistico Giapponese, grazie all’inedita partecipazione del più grande numero di wrestler Giapponesi mai visto finora in Europa. In aggiunta, ha come scopo risaltare il wrestling femminile Giapponese, leader mondiale nella formazione di formidabili atlete.

Lo spettacolo è stato confermato per Sabato 9 Novembre presso il Centro Commerciale “Città Fiera” di Torreano di Martignacco (provincia di Udine), nel nord-est Italia. Lo spettacolo sarà a ingresso gratuito e si svolgerà all’interno del “Città Fiera Comic Convention”, grande evento dedicato soprattutto a fumetti, videogiochi, cosplay ed altri elementi della cultura pop Giapponese.

Lo spettacolo sarà svolto in collaborazione con "Bologna Wrestling Team", uno dei gruppi leader del wrestling Italiano.

Nome dell'evento: Rising Slam

Data: 9 Novembre 2019 (Sabato)

Località: Centro Commerciale "Città Fiera", Via Antonio Bardelli 4, Torreano di Martignacco (UD), 33035 Italia. (Il centro commerciale è a circa 10 minuti in auto da Udine, la città più grande della zona, oppure 20 minuti in autobus - Linea 9 - che si ferma esattamente di fronte alla struttura)

Inizio spettacolo: 16:00 circa

Riteniamo fondamentale che lo stile unico del wrestling Giapponese abbia la possibilità di essere visto dal vivo anche in Europa non solo tramite atleti individuali, ma piuttosto tramite un gruppo più ampio.

Grazie al Vostro supporto questo sogno si può trasformare in realtà, creando un evento da parte dei fan del wrestling per i fan del wrestling. Con la riuscita di questo evento, inoltre, potremo aprire la strada a una maggiore interazione tra Giappone ed Europa anche in questo straordinario e unico mondo del wrestling professionistico.

 

DI COSA ABBIAMO BISOGNO

Essendo gratuito al pubblico, l’evento ha necessità di fondi per poter pagare le spese relative agli atleti che vi si esibiranno. Tra queste sono incluse voci quali l’alloggio, i trasporti e i pasti. L’obbiettivo della campagna è la raccolta di 8.000€ per coprire le spese rimaste e permettere così la buona riuscita dello spettacolo sia per il pubblico sia per le atlete stesse che non vedono l’ora di mettersi alla prova anche fuori dal Giappone.

Tra i nomi invitati a partecipare a questo evento unico ci sono 8 atlete dal Giappone:

- Makoto (freelancer), soprannominata "Oriental Doll", è l'atleta di maggiore esperienza con i suoi 13 anni di attività.

- Tsukushi (Ice Ribbon), piccola ma temibile atleta, nasconde un carattere diabolico dietro alla sua aria di innocenza.

- Tequila Saya (Ice Ribbon), con la sua prima (ed ultima) spedizione all'estero, si ritirerà dal wrestling il 31 Dicembre. Non perdete quest'unica occasione di vederla dal vivo!

- Rina Yamashita (Freelancer), una palla demolitrice umana, è sicuramente la wrestler più potente tra quelle coinvolte.

- Tae Honma (AWG Beginning), una persona solare ma impavida, utilizza strategia e tecnica per avere la meglio sulle avversarie.

- SAKI (AWG Color's), una vera leader dal grande carisma, nei match usa uno stile di combattimento "selvaggio".

- Mari (AWG Color's), ninja dalle risorse illimitate, combina tecnica, atletismo e calci letali.

- Misa Matsui (AWG Color's), esuberante e talentuosa, a soli 19 anni è la più giovane del gruppo.

 

COSA RICEVERETE PER IL VOSTRO SOSTEGNO

Se doveste avere l’opportunità di assistere allo show dal vivo, ma anche nel caso in cui Vi fosse impossibile, il Vostro sostegno non rimarrà fine a sé stesso. Grazie alla disponibilità delle atlete coinvolte nell’evento, abbiamo pensato a molti premi da offrire ai nostri sostenitori.

- Cartoline: disegnate in stile manga, saranno in otto varianti diverse rappresentanti ognuna delle wrestler chiamate per questo show.

- Ritratti autografati: ritratti 21x29,7 (A4) in edizione limitata disponibili esclusivamente su questa campagna e rappresentanti le atlete chiamate per lo show.

- T-shirt: maglietta che celebra la più grande spedizione “Joshi” mai realizzata in Italia, disegnata dalla wrestler Mari.

- Art Work: poster speciale 29,7x42 (A3) disegnato da Nagatoshi Sakai, illustratore ufficiale della New Japan Pro Wrestling.

- Poster firmato: locandina dell’evento autografata dai partecipanti.

- DVD: video dell’evento in formato dvd.

- Photobook: album fotografico dell’evento con in aggiunta commenti degli ospiti sulla loro esperienza in Italia.

- Cena esclusiva con i wrestler la sera dell’evento (limitata a chi assisterà allo spettacolo)

 

IN CASO DI MANCATO RAGGIUNGIMENTO DELLA CIFRA NECESSARIA

Qualora non si raggiunga la cifra stabilita, lo show si svolgerà ugualmente ma con il rischio di dover rinunciare a parte degli invitati a causa della mancanza di budget.

 

COSA SIGNIFICA QUESTO SHOW

In Giappone il wrestling è diventato ormai un elemento culturale, unendo persone di ogni genere ed età nelle arene o anche all’aperto per assistere ad uno spettacolo unico nel suo genere. Chiunque sia stato ad uno show di wrestling in Giappone può capire quanto sia speciale e carico di significato e, sebbene sia impossibile ricreare perfettamente quell’atmosfera, uno dei propositi di questo evento è quello di ricordare almeno in parte l’effetto di uno spettacolo di wrestling Giapponese.

 

NON POTETE SUPPORTARCI ECONOMICAMENTE?

Certo, non è sempre possibile offrire un contributo. Però potreste sempre prendere in considerazione l’idea di condividere questa campagna con i vostri amici o sui vostri profili social! Ogni condivisione conta, Vi ringraziamo per il Vostro aiuto!

Thanks to the kind help of the athletes involved in the event, we thought about many perks to offer to our supporters.- Postcards: designed with a unique manga style, postcards will be in 8 different versions representing every wrestler called for this show.- Signed Portraits: portraits 21x29,7cm (A4) in limited edition available only for this campaign and representing the athletes involved in the show.- T-Shirt: celebrating the largest “Joshi” expedition ever realized in Italy, this T-Shirt is designed by Mari.- Art Work: special poster designed by Nagatoshi Sakai, official illustrator of New Japan Pro Wrestling.- Signed Poster: poster of the event with all participants’ signs on it.- DVD: video of the show.- Photobook: photo album of the event with comments from guests about their experience in Italy.- Dinner: exclusive dinner with wrestlers on the event’s day (limited to people who will be in attendance). WHAT IF WE DO NOT REACH THE GOAL?The show will happen even if our goal won’t be reached, however there is  the risk of having to cut part of the guests due to the lack of budget. WHAT THIS SHOW MEANSWrestling is part of the Japanese culture nowadays, gathering people of any type and age inside arenas or even outdoor to witness a unique spectacle. Anyone who has been to a wrestling show in Japan can understand how special and meaningful it is and, despite it is impossible to perfectly simulate that atmosphere, one of the aims of this event is to recreate at least partially the effect of a Japanese wrestling show. IS IT IMPOSSIBLE TO SUPPORT US?Sure, it is not always possible to offer a contribution. But please take in account the idea of sharing this campaign with Your friends or on Your SNS profiles. Every share counts, thank You for Your help!  プロジェクト このプロジェクトは、ヨーロッパで前例のない数多くの日本人プロレスラー参加によって、日本のプロレスがそのジャンルの独自性と存在感をヨーロッパの皆さまにお見せすることを目的としています。さらに、強力なアスリートトレーニングにおいて世界のリーダーでもある日本の女子レスリングに焦点を当てています。このイベントは、2019年11月9日土曜日に、イタリア北東部のトレアーノディマルティニャッコ（ウディネ県）のショッピングセンター「チッタフィエラ」で開催されます。入場無料で、日本のポップカルチャーイベント（漫画、ビデオゲーム、コスプレなど）「チッタフィエラコミックコンベンション」内で開催されます。このプロレスの大会は，イタリアの代表的なプロレス団体「ボローニャ・レスリング・チーム」とのコラボにより行われます。大会名：”Rising Slam”開催日：2019年11月9日 土曜日会場： ショッピングセンター「チッタ・フィエラ」（イタリア共和国フリウリ＝ヴェネツィア・ジュリア自治州ウーディネ県トレアーノ・ディ・マルティニャッコ市ヴィア アントニオ バルデッリ4番地）（ウーディネ県の県都ウーディネから車で10分くらい，またはウーディネから路線番号No.9のバスで20分くらいで建物の正面に着く。）。開始時間：16時ころ（写真は2016年に同じ会場で2人の日本人選手をフィーチュアした際のもの）日本人プロレス界のその独自のスタイルは、ヨーロッパでもより多くの方々に観ていただき、その周知を広めていくべき価値のあるものです。皆様のサポートのおかげで、プロレスファンによってのレスリングイベント開催という目標を現実化することができ、さらに、このイベントの成功によって日本とヨーロッパのプロレス界のさらなる発展への道を開くことができると信じています。私たちに必要なもの入場無料で開催されるこのイベントには、参加するアスリートに費用を支払うための資金が必要です。これらの費用には、ギャラリー、宿泊、交通費、食事などが含まれます。目標額は€8.000です。より多くの方々に日本レスリングを知っていただくため、このイベントを成功に導くためにも、皆様からの心温かいご支援をいただければと思います。このイベントに招待されたプロレス選手の中に8人の日本女性アスリートがいます。‐ 真琴（フリーランス）-  つくし（アイスリボン）- テキーラ沙弥（アイスリボン）- 山下りな（フリーランス）- 本間多恵（AWGビギニング）- SAKI（AWGカラーズ）- 茉莉（AWGカラーズ）- 松井珠紗（AWGカラーズ）感謝の気持ちを込めて皆様へお返しするもの実際に会場に足を運んでいただけなくてもご支援いただいた皆様には大会に出場する選手たちより，たくさんの特典をご用意しています。- ポストカード: マンガスタイルで8種類のデザインを用意しました。本イベントに参加する選手が描かれています。‐￥1,197／1枚 - ￥7,179（8枚組）- サイン入りポートレート: 限定版のポートレート21x29,7cm（A4）は、本イベントの限定品で、本イベントに参加する選手のものです。￥2,393（1枚）- ￥15,555（8枚組）- Tシャツ: 今までの最も多数の「ジョシ」達のイタリア遠征を記念して，茉莉選手がデザインしたもの。￥3,590- イラスト作品: 新日本プロレスのオフィシャルデザイナー坂井永年氏デザインによるスペシャルポスター。￥3.350- サイン入りポスター: 本イベントに参加する選手がサインしたイベントのポスター。 ￥2,991- DVD: 本イベントのDVD。￥4,547- フォトブック: 本イベントに参加する選手からのコメント付きのイベントのフォトアルバム。￥5.983（通常版）- ￥10,769（スペシャル版）- 夕食会: イベント当日、本イベントに参加する選手との特別なディナー（本イベント当日参加出席できる方限定）。 ￥29,913- スペシャルキット: Tシャツ，フォトブック，DVD，ポストカードとポートレートが１つのパッケージに。このバンドルを選択する人は，メインサポーターとしてDVDにクレジットされます。￥35,895目標額に到達しない場合目標額に達しない場合でも大会は開催されますが，予算不足により一部の選手が出場できない場合があります。この大会を開催する意義プロレスは現代の日本の文化の一部であり，老若男女問わず多くの観客がアリーナや屋外の会場にこの「唯一無二のショー」を観戦しに集まります。日本でプロレスの大会に行ったことのある人なら誰でも，それが如何に特別で意味のあることであるかは分かります。たとえその独自の雰囲気をイタリアで完全に再現することは難しくても，少しでも日本のプロレスの持つ魅力を再構成し伝えることがイベントの目的のひとつでもあります。他にもサポートできる方法があります！このキャンペーンを友だちと共有したり、SNSプロフィールで共有したりしてください！。すべてのシェアが大切で、本イベントの開催の大きな助けとなります！皆様の心温かい助けに感謝いたします！   IL PROGETTO L’obbiettivo di questo progetto non-profit è mostrare al pubblico Europeo cosa rende unico nel suo genere il wrestling professionistico Giapponese, grazie all’inedita partecipazione del più grande numero di wrestler Giapponesi mai visto finora in Europa. In aggiunta, ha come scopo risaltare il wrestling femminile Giapponese, leader mondiale nella formazione di formidabili atlete.Lo spettacolo è stato confermato per Sabato 9 Novembre presso il Centro Commerciale “Città Fiera” di Torreano di Martignacco (provincia di Udine), nel nord-est Italia. Lo spettacolo sarà a ingresso gratuito e si svolgerà all’interno del “Città Fiera Comic Convention”, grande evento dedicato soprattutto a fumetti, videogiochi, cosplay ed altri elementi della cultura pop Giapponese.Lo spettacolo sarà svolto in collaborazione con "Bologna Wrestling Team", uno dei gruppi leader del wrestling Italiano.Nome dell'evento: Rising SlamData: 9 Novembre 2019 (Sabato)Località: Centro Commerciale "Città Fiera", Via Antonio Bardelli 4, Torreano di Martignacco (UD), 33035 Italia. (Il centro commerciale è a circa 10 minuti in auto da Udine, la città più grande della zona, oppure 20 minuti in autobus - Linea 9 - che si ferma esattamente di fronte alla struttura)Inizio spettacolo: 16:00 circaRiteniamo fondamentale che lo stile unico del wrestling Giapponese abbia la possibilità di essere visto dal vivo anche in Europa non solo tramite atleti individuali, ma piuttosto tramite un gruppo più ampio.Grazie al Vostro supporto questo sogno si può trasformare in realtà, creando un evento da parte dei fan del wrestling per i fan del wrestling. Con la riuscita di questo evento, inoltre, potremo aprire la strada a una maggiore interazione tra Giappone ed Europa anche in questo straordinario e unico mondo del wrestling professionistico. DI COSA ABBIAMO BISOGNOEssendo gratuito al pubblico, l’evento ha necessità di fondi per poter pagare le spese relative agli atleti che vi si esibiranno. Tra queste sono incluse voci quali l’alloggio, i trasporti e i pasti. L’obbiettivo della campagna è la raccolta di 8.000€ per coprire le spese rimaste e permettere così la buona riuscita dello spettacolo sia per il pubblico sia per le atlete stesse che non vedono l’ora di mettersi alla prova anche fuori dal Giappone.Tra i nomi invitati a partecipare a questo evento unico ci sono 8 atlete dal Giappone:- Makoto (freelancer), soprannominata "Oriental Doll", è l'atleta di maggiore esperienza con i suoi 13 anni di attività.- Tsukushi (Ice Ribbon), piccola ma temibile atleta, nasconde un carattere diabolico dietro alla sua aria di innocenza.- Tequila Saya (Ice Ribbon), con la sua prima (ed ultima) spedizione all'estero, si ritirerà dal wrestling il 31 Dicembre. Non perdete quest'unica occasione di vederla dal vivo!- Rina Yamashita (Freelancer), una palla demolitrice umana, è sicuramente la wrestler più potente tra quelle coinvolte.- Tae Honma (AWG Beginning), una persona solare ma impavida, utilizza strategia e tecnica per avere la meglio sulle avversarie.- SAKI (AWG Color's), una vera leader dal grande carisma, nei match usa uno stile di combattimento "selvaggio".- Mari (AWG Color's), ninja dalle risorse illimitate, combina tecnica, atletismo e calci letali.- Misa Matsui (AWG Color's), esuberante e talentuosa, a soli 19 anni è la più giovane del gruppo. COSA RICEVERETE PER IL VOSTRO SOSTEGNOSe doveste avere l’opportunità di assistere allo show dal vivo, ma anche nel caso in cui Vi fosse impossibile, il Vostro sostegno non rimarrà fine a sé stesso. Grazie alla disponibilità delle atlete coinvolte nell’evento, abbiamo pensato a molti premi da offrire ai nostri sostenitori.- Cartoline: disegnate in stile manga, saranno in otto varianti diverse rappresentanti ognuna delle wrestler chiamate per questo show.- Ritratti autografati: ritratti 21x29,7 (A4) in edizione limitata disponibili esclusivamente su questa campagna e rappresentanti le atlete chiamate per lo show.- T-shirt: maglietta che celebra la più grande spedizione “Joshi” mai realizzata in Italia, disegnata dalla wrestler Mari.- Art Work: poster speciale 29,7x42 (A3) disegnato da Nagatoshi Sakai, illustratore ufficiale della New Japan Pro Wrestling.- Poster firmato: locandina dell’evento autografata dai partecipanti.- DVD: video dell’evento in formato dvd.- Photobook: album fotografico dell’evento con in aggiunta commenti degli ospiti sulla loro esperienza in Italia.- Cena esclusiva con i wrestler la sera dell’evento (limitata a chi assisterà allo spettacolo) IN CASO DI MANCATO RAGGIUNGIMENTO DELLA CIFRA NECESSARIAQualora non si raggiunga la cifra stabilita, lo show si svolgerà ugualmente ma con il rischio di dover rinunciare a parte degli invitati a causa della mancanza di budget. COSA SIGNIFICA QUESTO SHOWIn Giappone il wrestling è diventato ormai un elemento culturale, unendo persone di ogni genere ed età nelle arene o anche all’aperto per assistere ad uno spettacolo unico nel suo genere. Chiunque sia stato ad uno show di wrestling in Giappone può capire quanto sia speciale e carico di significato e, sebbene sia impossibile ricreare perfettamente quell’atmosfera, uno dei propositi di questo evento è quello di ricordare almeno in parte l’effetto di uno spettacolo di wrestling Giapponese. NON POTETE SUPPORTARCI ECONOMICAMENTE?Certo, non è sempre possibile offrire un contributo. Però potreste sempre prendere in considerazione l’idea di condividere questa campagna con i vostri amici o sui vostri profili social! Ogni condivisione conta, Vi ringraziamo per il Vostro aiuto!

story:
JES 2020.  

"JES", Jämmer och Elände i Skåne, var ett projekt som startade i blygsam skala i december 2018 med a 30 gäster. Sen under under 2019 drog JES drygt 3500 gäster och hittills under 2020 har ca 750 gäster. 
Syftet med projektet var att lyfta fram mörka delar av vår lokalhistoria.
Att höra historien om vad som hänt, på plats där det hände. 
Framför allt för att göra människor medvetna om denna viktiga historia i deras närhet. 
Skapa ett historieintresse, som man gör enklast genom att just belysa mörka, skrämmande delar av historien. 
Men också för att förhoppningsvis, med utgångspunkt från historien, skapa en sundare människosyn i nutid. 

Vi höll historiska vandringar på mentalsjukhuset S:t Lars i Lund under hela året och sen september höll vi även historiska vandringar på mentalsjukhuset Vipeholm. 

Under 2020 kommer vi att utveckla JES ytterligare.
Vi fortsatte ha en ny, djupare beskrivning av historien kring  S:t Lars, med fler enskilda livsöden, i S:t Lars del 2. I kombination med fika. 
Vi kommer att fortsätta med denna och våra vandringar på S:t Lars och Vipeholm. 
Vi planerar också att fortsätta våra historiska vandringar med historier om avrättningsplatser i Skåne, samt bödelsyrket med planerad uppstart i höst.   
Dessutom planerar vi också att berätta historien kring massakern vid Klågerup år 1811. Även detta med planerad start i höst

Det finns också planer på att i framtiden vidareutveckla JES utanför Skånes gränser och bli
Jämmer och Elände i Sverige. Kanske  samband med våra historier kring bödelsyrket. 

För att kunna fortsätta utveckla detta projekt, behöver vi nu ert stöd. 
Ta del av våra erbjudanden och hjälp oss göra JES ännu större och nå ut till ännu fler.
